definitions.definition: An advisement providing more up-to-date information than currently known.
examples: He gave me an update on the situation in New York.

definitions.definition: A change in information, a modification of existing or known data.
examples: I just made an update to the Wikipedia article on guerrillas.

definitions.definition: An additional piece of information. An addition to existing information.
examples: I just made an update to my blog about my trip to Rome.

definitions.definition: A modification of something to a more recent, up-to-date version; ( in software ) a minor upgrade .
examples: Our database receives an update every morning at 3 AM.
I have a couple of updates to install on your laptop.

definitions.definition: A version of something which is newer than other versions.
examples: You should try the update : it rocks.

main_definition: An advisement providing more up-to-date information than currently known.
secondary_definitions: A change in information, a modification of existing or known data.
An additional piece of information. An addition to existing information.
A modification of something to a more recent, up-to-date version; ( in software ) a minor upgrade .
A version of something which is newer than other versions.
